scripts.deploy: yarn build;yarn sedprod;cp .env ./.output/server/.env; firebase deploy --only functions:server,hosting:production
scripts.deploystg: yarn buildstg;yarn sedstg;cp .env.development ./.output/server/.env; firebase deploy --only functions:serverstg,hosting:staging
scripts.deployci: yarn build;sed -ie 's/N as serverstg/N as server/' .output/server/index.mjs;sed -ie 's/"codebase": "serverstg"/"codebase": "server"/' ./firebase.json;cp .env ./.output/server/.env; firebase deploy --only functions:server,hosting:production
scripts.deploycistg: yarn buildstg;sed -ie 's/N as server/N as serverstg/' .output/server/index.mjs;sed -ie 's/"codebase": "server"/"codebase": "serverstg"/' ./firebase.json;cp .env.development ./.output/server/.env; firebase deploy --only functions:serverstg,hosting:staging
